<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Array]] of selected rows indices in the given listbox. If listbox is of style LB_MULTI (multi-selection) the array will contain multiple elements, otherwise only a single element. For single selection listbox one can also use [[lbCurSel]]. See also [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbSetSelected]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''lbSelection''' control </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_indices = [[lbSelection]] _control;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dt class="note">[[User:Dscha|Dscha]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
With the addition of '''RscListBoxMulti''' (in [[:Category:Introduced with Arma 3 version 1.98|<template><title>arma3</title></template> - 1.98]]), it is possible to get all the selected Rows with [[lbSelection]].
</dd>
